directions: Halve, pit, and peel avocados. Chop avocados fine and in a bowl stir together with remaining salsa ingredients. Salsa may be made 4 hours ahead and chilled, covered.
ingredients: 2 vine-ripened tomatoes (about 1 pound), seeded and chopped fine
1 pickled jalapeño chili, minced (wear rubber gloves)
title: Avocado Salsa
